name: Tetrapol II
description:
🎮 How to play?

📌 W or ( ↑ )  |  Forward Movement 
 📌 S or   ( ↓ )  |  Back Movement
📌 A or  (←)  |  Left Movement
📌 D or  (→)  |  Right Movement

🎮 Functions of Game Objects

📌 The game is started by using the start button or pressing the "Space" button.
📌 The four red areas in the game are the areas where the enemy is produced. A new one-time enemy will spawn if any enemy has been hit by the red zone while chasing the player.
📌 The player takes a certain amount of damage as soon as they interact with enemies.
📌 The game is lost when the player runs out of life or falls into the water.
📌 After all the stars are collected, the game is completed by interacting with the transition capsule that appears on the screen.

🔹Have fun!
